posts.post_content:
Jimmy Collins is up for sale with BIT pricing (Buy It Today)

The higher end of the card is better than the lower end of the card.

North of Minneapolis the card is superb.

Yours today for $OLD net to me with free shipping.  Imagine that.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10306/collins-j[/IMG]

And if you don't buy it today, you can BIT (Buy It Tomorrow):D:D

It just occurred to me that a few of you may not be in the market for a Honus Wagner T206, and might be just as happy with a Jimmy Collins.  I don't have to speculate that it would grade 2 or above, because it already has.  This card has been in my custody for nearly 7 years.  Let me know if you are interested at a reduced price of $OLD which includes shipping.  Net funds to me by any method.  If you send your drone, I can deliver the card via drone.

[quote name="Peter_Spaeth" post=1856351]Do you accept BITcoin?[/QUOTE]

Isn't 11 squared 121?
If it wasn’t graded a 2 it would be graded a 4.

Can't believe your trying to sell a card worth dozens of dollars without a high-res image. When you're new to a site you should probably try a little harder to be above-board...

:)

[quote name="Peter_Spaeth" post=1856351]Do you accept BITcoin?[/QUOTE]

Every BIT of it

My error is your gain, but if you want to pay $121, I will accept your offer and provide a high res scan.
